item.title: National Guard troops are outside Chicago and could be in Memphis soon in Trumpâ€™s latest deployment
item.description: National Guard troops are positioned outside Chicago and they could soon be in Memphis as the Trump administration pushes ahead with an aggressive policy toward big-city crime whether local leaders support it or not.
